UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of an antibacterial peptide, maculatin 1.1, from the skin glands of the tree frog, Litoria genimaculata.
Literature.Author: Niidome T, Kobayashi K, Arakawa H, Hatakeyama T, Aoyagi H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus IFO 12732(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis IFO 3134(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli IFO 12734(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa IFO 12582(MIC=32µM)
